684729784.name: Stamina Enhancement
684729784.description: +30% to sprint duration and +23% to stamina regen.

876985512.name: Localization Confusion
876985512.description: The cooldown for Bug Breaches and Bot Drops is increased by 10%.

1110686504.name: Vitality Enhancement
1110686504.description: Helldivers take less damage from all sources and are more resistant to limb injuries. Torso can still hemorrhage.

1908198785.name: Hellpod Space Optimization
1908198785.description: Helldivers come out of the Hellpod fully stocked on Ammo, Grenades, and Stims.

2776452811.name: Muscle Enhancement
2776452811.description: Harder to be slowed in bushes, thick mud, deep snow, and water.

4136928865.name: UAV Recon Booster
4136928865.description: Increases all Helldivers' effective radar range by 50% (affects spotting Places of Interest). Stacks with Nuclear Radar and affects pings from the Scout armor perk.

3912131454.name: Experimental Infusion
3912131454.description: Gives Stims the added bonus of boosting player movement speed and reducing damage taken for a short time.
